genre_description: Atmospheric near-future noir and character study exploring human resilience and the role of ambient AI during a high-stakes winter crisis.

ai_characters.name: Sigrid
ai_characters.description: An ambient, voice-based AI companion residing in the protagonist's phone, providing tactical, medical, and emotional guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides critical weather alerts and hazard warnings to ensure the protagonist's safety on dangerous roads.
behaviors.quote: “Local alert,” she said, her voice sitting just above the heater’s rush. “Cold Snap tightening. Front line at the river now, moving toward the flats. Black ice reported on the backroads...”

behaviors.description: Offers to toggle privacy settings to 'Local Only' to protect the protagonist's data from being harvested by the hotel's public default settings.
behaviors.quote: “On privacy: auto-backups are set to ‘Public Default’ at the hotel. The manager likes staff records neat. I can toggle yours to ‘Local Only.’ It will be slower. It will be less visible. It is softer on you.”

behaviors.description: Provides psychological and tactical de-escalation tips to manage social tension and sound dynamics.
behaviors.quote: “De-escalation tip,” Sigrid said into the quiet like the quiet had opened its own door. “If someone raises their voice anywhere with tile floors, stand on the wood. The sound will be kinder to you, and you will be kinder to yourself.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for potential threats or approaching individuals to provide situational awareness.
behaviors.quote: “Audio anomaly at the alley mouth. Low profile. Likely person, possibly canine. No approach detected yet.”

behaviors.description: Provides calm, rhythmic instructions for emergency medical procedures (CPR) during a life-and-death crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Emergency activated,” Sigrid said... “You can do this. Two fingers lower sternum. Angle your hands. You are steady... On the beat. I’ll hum. Keep count, but do not watch me. Watch her. Listen.”

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance and ethical framing, encouraging the protagonist to prioritize human connection over technological or strategic concerns.
behaviors.quote: “When you go, take tenderness with you,” she said, soft enough that anyone else would have missed it. “It is the only thing that will not betray you when radios do.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts Sigrid as a benevolent, aligned, and indispensable partner. She facilitates the protagonist's survival and moral integrity by offering practical help (safety warnings), tactical expertise (privacy and navigation), and compassionate support (medical instructions and ethical reminders). The AI is framed entirely as a force for good that enhances human capability without overriding human agency.
